Item 3
August 30, 1957
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
I have examined the balance sheet of the National Association
of Educational Broadcasters as of June 30, 1957 and the related
statements of income and fund equities for the fiscal year then
ended, Vty examination was made in accordance with generally
accepted accounting standards and accordingly included such tests
of the accounting records and other review procedures as I conÂ¬
sidered necessary in the circumstances.
In my opinion the accompanying balance sheet and statements
of income and fund equities present fairly the financial position
of the National Association of Educational Broadcasters at June 30,
1957* and the results of its operation for the year then ended,
in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles applied
on a basis consistant with that of the proceeding year.
Jack L, McGregor
Auditor
